ygData.subject: Re: RE: Anyone on this list?
ygData.msgSnippet: I am 100% with you on that one.  People complain about us charging to hit combine, but that s not what we charge for.  We charge for all the time and money
ygData.messageBody:
I am 100% with you on that one. People complain about us charging to hit "combine," but that's not what we charge for. We charge for all the time and money that was spent to get us to the point where clicking "combine" does anything. There are also some major economical ramifications of giving away a trueshot. If this bow could be attained very easily, there would be no market for ash or oak, as they are inferior bows, yet they would cost way more. 200pp is a little steep for Povar (they usually go for around 150-175 with no materials provided), but your server may have less master fletchers.

Slig of Povar

>>> "Murr Rockstroh" <mrockstr@...> 07/19 1:27 PM >>>
From: "Murr Rockstroh" <mrockstr@...>

LOL, I think most of us were waiting for someone else to start. We
fletchers are generally anti-social anyway :) We just like to be left alone
to sort out our arrow parts and quitely make our arrows recording each point
as it clicks up.....

Oh and was I out of line on this one?

I Got into some arugement last night with some guy who was whining to me
about me wanting to charge him for the bow. He said "But I spent 6 hours
yesterday gathering materials to make this bow, doesn't that mean anything?"
I said "Yes it means you must really want this bow." He said "SO you'll
make it for me for free?" To which I replied "No, it's still going to cost
you 200 pp" And he said again "Damn, I have spent so much time gathering
materials and now I still have to pay for it? That sucks, you aren't a nice
person, blah blah blah"

Then I laid into him. I told him, Oh you spent time away from your friends,
away from adventuring for ONE NIGHT!! And now you want what is the
equivalent of the best fletched bow in the game handed to you because of
that??? I then said, how long do you think it took ME to get to the level
that I could make a Darkwood Bow? How many times do you think I had to PAY
400pp to stick in that kit and hit combine in the hopes that I would get
what is essentially the same bow you now want for nothing? I told him, I
have almost 19 Days of played time on this character, that is less than 1
level per 24 hours of game time. So quit your whining and earn that damn
bow you want so desperately, go learn fletching and get to the level I am
and you can make all you want then.

To which he replied, "So how much cash did you want again?"

I don't think that 200 to 250 pp is too much to ask (unless the customer is
a good friend, that's when I ask them to get me some parts for several
attempts instead of cash)

Vapn, Master Fletcher, Povar
